announce.text: Auto-announcements: The GMShop, Global Teleporter and NPCBuffer are in your Magic Gem (look at your inventory!)
Auto-announcements: Are you looking for server information? Check the Community Board (ALT + B)!
Auto-announcements: Never miss an Automatic Event or Gainak Siege! There you can collect the new Event - Apigas to trade for great rewards!
Auto-announcements: The farm zones are revamped! You should give them a try!
Auto-announcements: Never share your account information!
